name: Into The Dark (itch) (GrayDwarf)
description:
Early Access - v0.1

  • Goal: 
    • Reach bottom of pit

  • Controls:
    • Options Menu: ESC. Hit it twice if in full screen.
    • Move: ASDW or Arrow Keys
    • Jump: Space
    • Left click to interact.
  • Hints:
    • Finding weapon upgrades is imperative to your success. 
    • Grass never hurt nobody.
    • Got a spare heart but full health? Use it to unlock the way.
    • Rocks. You don't have to take them with you if you don't want but they'll gladly come along should you let them.
  • Ideas (what do you think)
    • Player can push rocks around
    • More complex levels with ladders, doors and keys
    • Torchlight mechanics (I played around with this a bit early on)
  • Discord: 
    • https://discord.gg/YkQtDEbrrz
